main.name: Dominik Skorupski
main.occupation: Front-end developer with 3 years of commercial experience
main.description: I work with technologies: JavaScript+TypeScript, React+Redux, Angular+RxJs and many other. I speak English fluently and I know German at B1. I also worked in HR where i learned soft skills and customer service
main.bio: Before commercial experience I finished an intense 6-month Kodilla Front End programming course and also worked in HR industry for 5years. Training and projects in following technologies: HTML/CSS, Git/DevTools, JavaScript, AJAX/API, React/Vue . I invite you to check my projects in works section :) (projects might load 10 seconds)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
